SUB_W06_WRLD_BOFO_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_WRLD_BOFO_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hoo-ee! Temperature and humidity here take me
right back to the Green Hells—place even has
the same dead-hog smell to it. Also, the ground keeps movin' around?
Yessir, this place sucks.

SUB_W06_WRLD_BOFO_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_WRLD_BOFO_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Really? I find it fascinating—it's almost like
we're inside a body! The Twilight Area really
does connect to all sorts of places. But that said, let's find our triangle
before we're digested or something.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Got a mighty peculiar life-form here.
This place really can't get worse.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
What even is that critter?
Some sorta slime?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Blurp! There they are! The foreign bodies
that've thrown the Kosmos into turmoil!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
We're just here looking for a triangle,
friend. No one wants to throw anyone
into anything—least of all us.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't play dumb with me! You are clearly
foreign bodies, and that triangle story
smells like a pile of excreta. Now prepare to be excised like
the malignant growths you are!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Maybe you'll think twice about bein' rude
to foreigners if I rearrange your face!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Calm down, Bonnie—for all we know, 
we're intruding on its nesting grounds.
That could be what it means when it
calls us 'foreign bodies.'

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Hmm... I'll grant that you don't resemble
typical malignancies, but you're also not
anything I've seen before. Yes, of course. Perhaps you're some sort
of benign growths, or even a—

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
How about this: I'm Bonnie,
and that there's Formina.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Benign Bonnie and Formina growths? Fascinating!
Yes, well, while benignancies are not subject
to excision, if this is an attempt at deception,
you will pay for it in blood and bile!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I am Byaku, a priest that protects
the integrity of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, you're a Kosmos peace officer?
Why didn't you just say so! So listen,
cop to cop: can you help us find a
triangle somewhere around here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Hm... Here in the Kosmos, we sometimes get
reports about attacks from strange triangles,
and there are some who blame them for all
manner of unusual happenings. But I am not among them, for I have
never seen a triangle with my own eye.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
That said, you clearly appear set on searching
them out no matter what I say. I am willing to
help you in this, but as I am in the midst of my
rounds, it must wait until I complete them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I'd get real antsy standin' around.
Maybe we could back you up?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
An excellent idea! With your help,
my rounds shouldn't take long at all.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Plus, it'll give us a chance to look
for triangles. Because who knows?
Maybe we'll catch a lucky break.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
My rounds often take me to dangerous places.
As my forte is defense, I would be pleased
if you could assume a more offensive role.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Kickin' tail is what we do best.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Our first destination is over there,
so let us be off. Locomotion, ho!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This is the Digestica, one of our four great
temples. At this holy site, substances from
the outer worlds are processed and broken
down to provide energy to the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This Digestica looks a whole heckuva lot
like a stomach. Maybe we really are in
some sorta body here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Well, we're definitely inside a body,
because that is ABSOLUTELY a stomach.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Defending these temples is the primary
duty for those in the Order of Leukos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Is the Digestica supposed to be that color?
Looks like it ate something that didn't
rightly sit well with it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.text:
The color and luster of the Digestica
looks a little unhealthy to me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Yes, I noticed this as well; an abnormality
seems to have emerged for some reason.
We will need to investigate at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.text:
A foreign body—and the malignant kind!
You must excise it at once!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.text:
The malignancies that infiltrate the body
hide in all manner of places, and seek nothing
less than the destruction of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.text:
Well, we excised the malignancy,
but the Digestica don't look any better.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.text:
It doesn't look like that malignancy
was connected to whatever's wrong
with the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Which means the source of the anomaly
must lie elsewhere. Have you noticed
anything unusual?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.text: Well sir, I reckon I was sorta wondering about them oily clumps stuck to the pillars over yonder.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.text:
Ah, yes! Those are fat globules. While the Kosmos
requires them to function, I doubt the Digestica
would be able to process so many at once.
This may indeed be the anomaly we seek.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.text:
So an upset stomach, basically.
This whole thing makes me wanna
start watchin' my fatty foods.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.text:
We must destroy the fats. Let us break them
into smaller pieces so they will be easier for
the Digestica to process and unload.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Ram into 'em to break 'em down.
You got it, pardner.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
To think that malignancies have infested
even this most sacred of lands...
We must be ever vigilant!

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
These malignancies are lurkin'
all over the dang place!

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
That was the last of the fats.
If we repair the Digestica now,
it should resume its normal function.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.text: So is this the end of your rounds?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.text:
The end? By the Kosmos, no!
Now we head to the other temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Shoulda reckoned it
wouldn't be that easy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.text:
The flow in this passage has been restored.
We can use it to reach our destination.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.text: Wait, are we goin' through a blood vessel? Can't say I care much for this...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.text:
C'mon, it'll be just like a waterslide!
Just wish I'd brought my swimsuit.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Pray cease flapping your mandibles
and come with me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Ptoo! Gah! Am I still alive?
Didn't get digested or nothin', did I?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_01.text:
You're looking good, Officer Blair.
Everything's still attached.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the Respiquary—the temple that
controls the atmosphere of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
So this has gotta be the lungs—and
they ain't lookin' too healthy neither.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.text: Byaku! How are you today, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, that's Blan, one of the junior priests.
He's been assigned to the Respiquary guard.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
You sure about that? That's a heckuva
wind blowin' outta that thing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Of course there's a wind blowing out of it!
Do you not remember me telling you how
the Respiquary controls the atmosphere?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Are those weird foreign bodies
bothering you, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Can't say I appreciate
your tone, feller.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Please treat these two as you
would any of my subordinates.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Not tryin' to pull rank here, pard,
but when did you become my C.O.?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.text: Also, now that you mention it, the wind is blowing a bit more strongly than usual. I wonder what that's about.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_000.text: Boy, that smarts... Can't believe y'all consider this kinda thing normal!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.text: Anomaly, sir! We have an anomaly!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
We must investigate this at once.
To the Respiquary!

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.text:
Can't approach head-on with this
much wind. Best we circle around.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.text:
Blast! The wind's too strong to
approach it from this direction.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary's condition is irregular.
It must be repaired at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_010.text:
A lung abnormality, eh?
Could just be a cold.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.text: It must have blown in on the wind.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Let us repair the Respiquary at once.
Give us a hand, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.text:
We merely slapped a bandage over the problem,
but that should keep it working for a while.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_010.text: You sure do know your stuff.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.text:
Those born into the priesthood have a sacred
duty to protect the Kosmos, and have been
blessed with the power to repair the temples. One could say we are the chosen elite,
beings selected by the very Kosmos itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.text:
Thank you for the assistance, sir!
I can take it from here!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.text:
Good, because I must return to my rounds—
and between the events at the Digestica
and this, I fear some evil is afoot.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Yessir, this here's a brain
if I've ever seen one.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Cognitheon—the center of the Kosmos,
and the place that controls all other holy sites.
As I feared, there is an anomaly here. We must find and excise it with all speed,
for if the Cognitheon were to shut down
the entire Kosmos would descend into chaos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
If it's so all-fired important,
why ain't it under guard?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
A contemporary of mine in the priesthood
named Safed should be doing so, but...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
But he's off goldbrickin' around somewhere?
Well, you should probably get to fixing
this thing before it's too late.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Indeed. Whatever this anomaly is, it appears
to have severed the Cognitheon's connection
to the circuits which supply its power.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't rightly know what that means,
but it sure sounds bad. What do we do?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh dear. I have never seen such a thing.
I'm not even sure how to approach this...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
We've got enough problems involvin'
stopped brains—I can't have yours
seizin' up on us too!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Them pokey things sproutin' around the temple
must be the circuits, yeah? And look! That one
there is a mite different from all the others.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.text:
While a small amount of electricity
is flowing over there, its range is
insufficient to reach the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Well, there you go! We can just link
them circuits up until the flow reaches
the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.text: Interesting. Yes, that just might work.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Let's make us a connection from this
circuit to the one next to it.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
A fine idea. But first, we must excise
the malignancies in the area.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Consider 'em excised!
Now let's start linkin' circuits.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Not all of the circuits are operating.
Select the ones that electricity seems
able to flow through, then link them.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_ALONE1A_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_ALONE1A_000.text:
We got no juice—this circuit must
be busted. Best we try again.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.text:
Yee-haw! Look at that juice flow!
Now we just keep linking 'em up
until we reach the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.text:
All right, we have electricity flowing all
the way to the Cognitheon. Now to restore
power to the main part itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.text:
We gotta connect the circuits so
the electricity can flow all the
way to the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Good. Then you hop on that while
I excise me some malignancies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Looks like everything's
finally up and runnin'.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.text:
I could not have done it without the
two of you. You have my thanks.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.text: Uh-oh. Got a man down over here!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.text:
Heavens, man! You're hurt!
What happened to you!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_060.text: Damn, those wounds are deep. Poor feller's a goner for sure...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.text:
I'm sorry... I failed to defend the Cognitheon,
and now...I'm done for... I leave this place...
in your hands...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.text:
Hard to imagine that sorta wound pattern
came from the malignancies we been
dealin' with—but what do you think?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.text:
Safed was the most powerful member of the
priesthood; no mere malignancy could have
ever laid him so low.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_110.text:
Sounds like you got a suspect in mind.
I'll hang back and follow your lead.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.text: We must visit the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This must be the heart.
How's it looking?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The Circuleum has completely stopped!
If we don't do something, all activity
in the Kosmos will soon cease—but I
have absolutely no idea WHAT to do!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, we can't perform CPR from inside
a body, but we could do a cardiac massage
like field surgeons sometimes have to do.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Considerin' the scale of the dang thing,
I think that'll mean rammin' it full-tilt
in hopes the shockwaves get it tickin'.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.text:
That sounds like a rather fanciful idea,
but even a thin hope is better than none.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_000_CUT_000_050.text: Ain't no time to waste. Go!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.text:
We start here and charge hard
straight at the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.text: Curses! The malignancies have found us!

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text:
The Cognitheon's beatin' again!
Now ain't that a relief.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text:
Might have overdone it that time—
but the Cognitheon's tickin' again,
so I'm callin' this a win.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_000_000.text: Well? Think you can mend it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.text: Fine work on your rounds today, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Hoo boy, I know high command
when I see it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.text:
May I ask where you've been, Your Eminence?
I thought the Circuleum was your post.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.text:
I had urgent business elsewhere.
How are the other temples looking?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.text:
There were anomalies in all of them.
We took emergency measures in each case,
but the situation remains terribly unstable.
And I fear there is even worse news...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.text:
Safed is dead. Murdered in cold blood
by an unknown assailant.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_070.text: Mmm. I'm sorry to hear it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.text: May I ask a question, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.text:
Why did you try to destroy the temples?
And why did you take Safed's life!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_120.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_120.text:
Found your perp, did you?
That didn't take long.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.text:
That is a dangerous accusation to be
bandying about without proof, Byaku.
Most dangerous indeed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.text:
But I do have proof, Your Eminence.
For while malignancies caused the anomalies
at the temples, it is obvious the damage
was inflicted with great purpose.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.text:
Additionally, Safed's wounds were
clearly not the work of a malignancy,
but of a fellow priest.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.text:
And the only one who would have had the
opportunity to lay him low was you,
High Priest Valkoinen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.text:
Hmph! A fine deduction, Byaku. But what you
fail to grasp is that all I have done was in
accordance with the will of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.text: How can you possibly claim such!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.text:
...A malignancy? By the Kosmos!
The high priest has become malignant!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.text:
And now, Byaku, it is the will of the
Kosmos that you join Safed in death.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.text:
The Kosmos has begun to initiate its own
ruination. Now let us see if you can resist
when your new destiny is bestowed upon
you by the universe itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.text:
Startin' to sound like this ain't
gonna be a by-the-book operation.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.text:
I've never heard of a benignancy turning into
a malignancy, nor of the Kosmos initiating its
own ruination. But I also cannot dismiss such
claims as mere tomfoolery.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.text:
My rounds are now finished.
I am deeply grateful for your help,
and sorry to have imposed upon you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.text:
What are you gonna do now, Byaku?
Don't tell me you're gonna try to
solve this case by your lonesome?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.text:
Maintaining peace within the Kosmos is my
sacred duty. Even if I must do it alone,
I will never cease my vigil.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_060.text:
Well, we're not ready to leave—
we haven't even found our triangle yet.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_070.text:
And I reckon helpin' you is the
only way we'll ever get that done.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.text:
Are you certain? Though I cannot begin
to imagine what will happen next, I fear
you will be placing your life in danger.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.text:
There's safety in numbers, and three is
a heckuva lot more than one. So where's
this investigation going next?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.text:
We go to the place where priests are
born in search of further information.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_010_CUT_020_110.text:
A visit to Byaku's hometown?
Well, this should be delightful.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Behold Thymus, the place from which we
priests hail. Most of the benignancies
that live in the Kosmos were born here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
As many benignancies still live here now,
one may know more about what's happening.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Looks pretty empty to me.
Maybe folks're out runnin' errands?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Thymus is never this quiet.
Be on your guards.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, speak of the devil!
Looks like their errands are done.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Malignancies... And so many!
How did they manage to break in here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Hate to say it, but what if there were benignancies
of Thymus that've gone malignant like your high
priest? It's pretty much the plot of every dang
zombie movie, after all.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.text: What can this mean? Could there possibly be an abnormality within the Kosmos itself?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
No, wait! I'm not malignant!
Are you two still normal?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
You're a priest, right? Thank the Kosmos!
Not sure about the weird growths standing
next to you there, but...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_050.text:
I'm Bonnie, and that's Formina.
We're here lookin' for triangles.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.text: You there. You're a carrier, yes?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Skittish cowards who run about dodging
malignancies as they transport things
from one place to another.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.text:
Oh, that's charming, especially coming from the
mouth of someone whose high priest was just killed.
Also, if you three are all that stands between
chaos and the Kosmos, I think we're screwed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.text:
All right, you two, break it up!
What's your name there, ma'am?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.text:
Pleased to make your acquaintance.
Our cranky friend here is called Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.text:
Do you even know what you were fighting
when you battled those malignancies earlier?
They used to be benign!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.text:
Oh, we are very much aware; when the
high priest turned malignant earlier,
we were forced to end his life.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.text:
It would seem they all began to change after
hearing a divine message from the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.text:
The high priest also told us that the Kosmos
had initiated its own ruination. Do you know
anything about that, Carrier?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.text: No, but it wouldn't surprise me if the Kosmos decided to destroy itself. I mean, just take a look around. Things are bad.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.text:
So this Kosmos is turning everyone into
malignancies so it can destroy itself?
Well, ain't that just a thing...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.text:
Yeah—but I'm not sure the Kosmos
actually knows that's what it's doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.text:
The carrier is suggesting that someone has
interfered with the sacred will of the Kosmos
and is now pulling the strings, as it were.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.text:
That ain't the sort of theory you raise
unless you already got a suspect in mind.
Who you talkin' about there, pard?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.text:
The legendary malignancy that deceived God,
took control of the masses, and destroyed
the world? That's a fairy tale for zygotes!
Canker doesn't actually exist!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.text:
Ah, but all folklore has foundation in fact.
Why can't it actually be a real event
that occurred in the long-distant past?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.text:
If we assume for the moment that you are
correct, I suppose the return of Canker would
be enough to explain these abnormalities...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.text:
Good enough for me. Let's roll up on
this Canker feller and bring him in.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.text:
You do not understand. Canker is immortal.
If he truly has returned to this world,
there is nothing we can do to stop him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.text:
Actually, there might be one way—although
it would involve a priest like you working
very closely with a carrier like me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.text:
Absurd! No priest would ever join forces
with a mere carrier!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.text:
Figured you'd say that. Well, good luck
handling things by yourself, then!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.text:
W-wait! It is my sworn duty to protect this world.
So for the sake of that duty, I will—just this
once—debase myself to a level where I cooperate
with your lowly self.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.text:
No. Please. Stop. I can't take
so much flattery all at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.text:
Anyway, I'll take that as a yes and go on
ahead. When you're ready, come outside
so I can explain the details.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.text:
I think Erytheia's hidin' something here,
so let's not expect too much outta this.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.text:
Oh, I trust her like I trust a cyst—
yet sadly, we have no other leads.
But the moment she does anything
strange...you know what to do.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_390.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_390.text:
Listen, Byaku, I've noticed you were
awfully hard on Erytheia. Do you maybe
have feelings for her or something?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_400.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_400.text:
So THAT'S what it was! Land sakes,
he's like a first-grader yankin' the
pigtails of the girl he's sweet on.
C'mon, feller, you're better'n that.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_410.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_410.text:
This entire line of questioning is an insult.
I am a priest; I do not persecute other
benignancies. Now let us waste no further
time discussing the matter.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_420.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_420.text:
Are you buying that denial,
or was it just embarrassed backpedaling?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_430.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_430.text:
Hon, I got no goldurn idea
when it comes to that feller.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Do you understand what this clump is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Nasty as all get-out,
whatever it is.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
This is one of Canker's roots. He uses these
to suck the life force of the Kosmos from its
temples, which is what allows him to grow.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Wait... Something's amiss at the temples!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Because of Canker, the balance of the
entire Kosmos has begun to collapse.
We don't have much time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Holy powers that have been sealed within
the four great temples—ones said to be
effective against even the power of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Also, I find it very odd that you—a priest—
are unaware of this. I thought it was a secret
that was passed down through your order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Not nearly as odd as the fact that it's
known by a base carrier such as yourself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Transmitting info is a carrier's job;
we tend to pick up whispers along the way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, well, how do you intend to use these
antibodies against Canker when we don't
even know where the creature is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Easy! We pump 'em into his roots
at the sides of the temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
So we use his own roots against him?
Well, I'll be switched...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
You three can choose which temple to start
with, but we need to do this thing fast.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, and one more thing: we need the power
of prayer to unseal the antibodies,
which is where Byaku comes in.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.text:
That's the voice of the Circuleum.
It's controlling Byaku now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.text: Why do you seek this power?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_080.text: 'Cause we want to save the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Now we just pump this stuff
straight into Canker's roots!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.text: Now we pump in the antibodies and...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.text: Then let's head to the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Digestica speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.text:
Display to me thine wisdom so I might
deem you worthy of my antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, crud. I ain't no good at
this pop-quiz kinda stuff...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Full is truth, and hungry is false.
Full, hungry, full, hungry expresses 10.
You supplicants must now express 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.text:
I think it wants us to figure out what
combination of the words 'full' and 'hungry'
will combine to express the number 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.text:
Mite bit peculiar, but all right.
So if full, hungry, full, hungry is 10,
then 100 would be...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.text: Full, full, hungry, hungry, full, hungry, hungry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.text:
Dangnabbit! Told you I was
no good at quizzes.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.text:
O ye who are bereft of wisdom,
show me instead thine might!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_18.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_18.text: Now HERE'S a test I can handle!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_20.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_20.text: Take a shot and sometimes you hit!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.text:
Thy request is granted.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.text:
So now we pump this junk into
Canker's roots, right?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.text:
Your might is impressive, supplicant.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.text:
So now we pump this junk into
Canker's roots, right?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.text: All right. Let's pump those antibodies!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.text: Then let's head to the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I am sorry, Blan, but those who have become
malignancies can never again be benign.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Y-yes, of course... Forgive me, sir.
I...I won't cause you any trouble.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.text: Blan, no! What are you doing!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Guess that level of determination is what
it takes to be a priest in these parts.
I salute your courage, pardner.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Respiquary speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Well, that was easier'n I thought.
Let's pump this junk into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.text:
The malignancies will get in the way.
Deal with them first!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.text: Then let's head to the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.text:
That ain't Safed—it's a dang malignancy!
Sorry, feller, but Safed is gone.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, poor Safed. He deserves to be at peace.
Might I ask you to grant him that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Cognitheon speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Well, that was easier'n I thought.
Let's pump this junk into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.text: Then let's head to the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text: I no longer sense the presence of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text:
No, somethin' still ain't right.
Look over yonder!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
The temple's sick again,
even after we excised Canker's roots!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: And something is emerging from it!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Canker!? But we defeated him!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
He's metastasized; his physical form
has already found refuge here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
So what do we do now?
We're plumb out of antibodies!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Yes, but the antibodies have weakened him;
you should be able to destroy him now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
'Bout time I got to hit somethin'!
Get ready for a whuppin', Canker!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Phew! Over at last.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: No. It's not.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
It ain't? 'Cause I'm pretty sure
that's Canker's dead body there.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Oh, he's dead all right...for the moment.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: What do you mean, 'for the moment'?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Canker is an immortal malignancy that
always returns to life eventually.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
So we ain't ever had
a chance to beat him!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
No, we beat him—but now the corpse
must be removed from the Kosmos
so it can never again return.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Madness! If we leave the Kosmos, we may never
be able to return! And even if we wanted to
take the risk, how can we possibly transport
so large a corpse!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
You? You won't do anything.
But me? Well, I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
You're a right professional, Erytheia.
I'm sorry I ever doubted you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Needless to say, this will be my final task.
I'll head out right away.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Carri... Nay, Erytheia. Thank you.
And please know that I am sorry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
What's gotten into you, Byaku?
This isn't like you at all.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Oh! Speaking of carrier duties, I still
have a special delivery for you, Byaku.
It's from Safed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
A triangle! What'n the heck
was Safed doin' with that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
I have no idea—but the delivery is made,
which means it's no longer my problem.
Take care of yourselves, guys.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: See you down the trail, Erytheia!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_00.text:
This is the way out. Also, I believe
you needed this item, so you are
welcome to take it with you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.text:
But that's all you have
to remember Safed by.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.text:
I suspect Safed only sent this to me because
it has something to do with his death.
Perhaps he took it from High Priest Valkoinen?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.text:
But at the moment, I've only conjecture—
so if you could tell me anything about
that triangle, I would appreciate it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.text:
All we know is that it signifies membership in
some group called Kissin' Too 'Em, but we ain't
got a clue who they are or what they want.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.text:
If that's the mystery you are investigating,
I have no doubt that you will solve it. And for the sake of Blan and Safed—who may
have turned malignant and died for this—
I expect no less of you. Good luck.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_05.text:
We won't let you down, pardner.
Thanks for the help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.text:
Hey, so what are those things
growing around the Digestica?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.text:
Those are the mucolisks. It is their duty to absorb
things which have been drawn into the Kosmos
and transport them to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.text:
Which would make them mucous membranes.
Well, your mucolisks are looking a little unwell—
I'm guessing that's not a coincidence?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.text:
Yes, something certainly seems to be amiss.
Perhaps they have been overloaded by excessive
activity? This would also explain why the
Digestica is in such poor condition.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.text:
Sounds like an upset stomach.
So how do we fix it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.text:
Fortunately, some of the mucolisks seem to
be functioning normally. Let us attempt to
harvest a bit of healthy mucus from them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_00.text:
The sick mucolisks are a different color than
the healthy ones, right? So we harvest healthy
mucous, and then what?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.text:
We culture the harvested mucus in the Digestica,
which will send it back out to the mucolisks.
Absorbing this new healthy mucus should bring
them back to their normal selves.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.text:
Just watch for the overloaded mucolisks!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_04.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_04.text:
Does that mean I'd be DIGESTED!? Cool!
When this is all over, I'll have to toss
something down there and see what happens.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.text:
Go harvest mucus from the functioning mucolisks,
but watch out for the overloaded ones!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: This is the last of them.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: We should have enough mucus now.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: Then let's get back to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.text:
Now the power of the Digestica will cultivate
the mucus and send it out to the mucolisks.
That should be enough to restore them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.text:
With the mucolisks under control, the Digestica
is looking a lot better—but what was it that
overloaded them in the first place?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.text:
I imagine they were reacting to an excessive—
and unknown—stimulus. We will need to perform
a full investigation at a later time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.text: For now, we continue our rounds.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary is the temple that regulates
the atmosphere of the Kosmos. We should find
my subordinate Blan somewhere around here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.text:
We have a serious problem here, sir!
A malignancy lurks in the alveoli!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm not entirely sure, sir!
Probably one of the unhealthy ones?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Alveoli? Those must be the
air sacs around the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
The darker alveoli look to be the
unhealthy ones—and apparently one
of them is harboring a malignancy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
If so, why not just search them from
one end to the other? Doesn't seem
like rocket science to me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Look at these foreign bodies strolling around
like they own the place! Should I take them
out with extreme prejudice, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Easy, Blan. They are my guardians—and while
they may be foreign bodies, I trust they know
about that of which they speak.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.text:
Let's search each of these unhealthy
mucolisks and find the malignancy
that's hiding among them.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I don't see any around here.
Any luck with you, Blan?

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It must be closer to the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It might be further from the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It has to be somewhere on the side
closer to the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It could be somewhere on the side
closer to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Hang on... Oh yeah, I think there's
still a malignancy around here.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
These malignancies must be great at
hide-and-seek—but they won't escape me!

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I sense no more malignancies, sir.
I think we excised them all.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Then all that's left to do is
restore the Respiquary itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.text:
I will revive the Respiquary.
Lend me your aid, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.text: Everything should be fine now, sir!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.text: Still, it's unusual for malignancies to attack around the Respiquary instead of simply assaulting it directly.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.text:
It's almost like they're learning, sir!
Which is VERY disturbing!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.text:
That's for sure; an evolution like that would
suggest this is part of something far bigger!
...I mean, if this were a mystery novel.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_000_000.text: That's got to be the heart.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Circuleum—that which maintains the
very life of the Kosmos. It is a temple guarded
by our High Priest Valkoinen himself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Your Eminence! Are you here!?
It's Byaku, I've come on my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.text:
High Priest Valkoinen!
Wh-what happened here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.text:
We were attacked by a pack of malignancies.
I'm excising them as fast as I am able,
but there are simply too many to deal with.
You must lend me your aid!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.text:
My pleasure, Your Eminence.
Get them, ladies!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_000.text: That should give us some breathing room.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.text:
You are potent warriors, my friends.
But who are you, exactly?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.text:
My name's Formina, and I'm traveling with
my friend Bonnie. Long story, but we've
somehow ended up on Byaku's security detail.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.text:
Is that so? Well, Formina, I think I could
make use of your particular brand of help.
Will you hear my request?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.text:
As you have no doubt observed, there is an
abnormality in the Circuleum. I would like
to stop nibbling around the edges and deal
with the problem at its source.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.text:
No, the abnormality has a different source.
Look there, if you would.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.text: Thymus is enveloped in a wall of fat!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.text:
Thymus is the homeland of all
who dwell within the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.text:
Every day, new citizens are born in Thymus.
The work they do serves as a major power
source for the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.text:
Sadly, the sudden appearance of that wall
is interfering with their activities.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.text:
If your countrymen are trapped inside that wall,
we'd better get them out quickly! Er, but I hope
you know some way to actually breach said wall,
because I've got nothing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.text:
Those are mitochondria. If you smear
them clockwise around the entire wall,
that should deal with the matter.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.text:
Oh, fun! I've only ever seen
these through a microscope! So we smear them on the wall clockwise?
That sounds like something you could do;
what do you need me for?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.text:
Because I dare not leave my post.
I'm counting on you!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.text:
You will need to circle around the wall
clockwise in order to smear the mitochondria
onto it and release those trapped within.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text: Ah, excellent! The wall is gone.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
I remember readin' somewhere
how mitochondria burns fat.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
I thought it was green algae that did that?
It was quite the trend for a while—I even
took supplements.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
Did it taste like pond scum?
'Cause that's what it was.

SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_BOFO_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
We should report our success
to the high priest at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.text:
My thanks for your efforts. The Circuleum
should be up and running again in no time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Incidentally, why did we
have to smear it clockwise?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.text:
Ha! 'Learn this one fat-burning secret
insiders don't want you to know!'

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.text:
If I may, Your Eminence, what made
that wall appear in the first place?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.text:
I don't know. Perhaps it was malignancies—or
perhaps not. Such a thing has not happened before,
and I intend to perform a full investigation.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.text:
Guess we'd better move on
to the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, this is the brain. I've seen ones
just like it in anatomical models.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.text:
That is the Cognitheon—the command center which
controls the other holy sites. A contemporary
of mine named Safed is in charge of its defense.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, Safed. Any irregularities
here at the Cognitheon?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Something is definitely wrong here:
the electrical flow from the circuits
is unstable, which leaves the Cognitheon
running at a diminished capacity.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.text:
The 'circuits' are the nerves
growing around the temple, right?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.text:
There's something rather strange
about the circuits over that way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.text:
Maybe the nerves have gone raw
from stress or something.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Benign foreign bodies.
They are protecting me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.text:
Look, if you know what the problem is,
why don't you just fix it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Much as I'd love to do that, keeping the
Cognitheon running is a full-time job.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_070.text:
Do not overstep, Formina;
you are here strictly to protect me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.text:
Actually, I would very much
appreciate your bodyguards' help!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.text: Fine—but where I go, you go!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_100.text:
Yes, yes, don't worry.
I assure you I know the drill.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.text: Despite my insistence on accompanying you, I don't actually have the faintest idea how to go about repairing them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.text:
Look more closely at the circuits.
Don't they seem to be flickering?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.text:
Of course! The order in which they're flickering
is the way the electricity flows, which means
we should fix them in the same order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_140.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_140.text:
Makes sense to me.
Let's give it a shot.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.text:
They're flickering in the same order as the
flow of electricity, which means we need to
fix them in the order of the flickers.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.text: I think I messed up the order.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.text: Then we start over from the beginning.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.text: I think we fixed the circuits.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.text:
Let us return to the Cognitheon
and report our success to Safed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_000.text: We got your circuits running again.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Wonderful! In that case, the Cognitheon
should return to normal capacity soon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Alert! Alert! We have been
infiltrated by malignancies!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.text:
The repairs on the Cognitheon are complete.
I'm grateful for all of your help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.text:
I still don't understand why the circuits
failed in the first place, but I suppose
we'll have to accept this as good enough.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.text: Now then, on with my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.text:
That completes my rounds. You two were
quite a big help—my apologies at having
kept you for so long.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.text:
And now you'll help us
find a triangle, right?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.text:
Apologies again, but there is still much that
I need to do. That said, I will gather what
information I can about your triangles,
and we can meet about it later.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_030.text:
If you have work to do, we'll tag along.
It's not like we have any leads to pursue
on our own, so it'd be more efficient
to just stick with you anyway.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.text:
You are strange benignancies indeed...
but I am happy to have the protection.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.text: I have business in Thymus. Let us be off!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I had a feeling you'd come once I heard
the news, Byaku. Er, but who's this?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_020.text:
My name is Formina. My friend Bonnie
and I are escorting Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Fair enough. Well, I'm Erytheia,
and I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Carriers risk their lives transporting both
objects and information from place to place.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Sounds like a tough job. Do you
need to get something transported
somewhere, Byaku?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.text:
No. We are here to access her vast knowledge.
Erytheia, do you have any insights into this
strange string of recent incidents?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, it's certainly different from the
malignancies' usual routine. It's almost like
they're observing how we go about our work.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.text:
So their goal is not to destroy the Kosmos,
but to learn more about it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.text:
That tracks with what I've seen.
The question is, why?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedBloodCell
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Halp! Haaalp! A giant foreign body has
appeared outside—one we've never seen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
Is that a malignancy? Because if so,
it's an unusually large one.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
That's not a malignancy—it's a parasite.
I never imagined I'd see one with my
own eye, but here we are.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
I've heard of parasites: they're bothersome
foreign bodies that suck the life from
other, better creatures.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Parasites possess the ability to control
malignancies; I think it's safe to conclude
that all of this is their doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.text:
They're marshalling the malignancies
to take over the Kosmos for themselves!
Er, or something like that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.text:
That may be the case, although I'm
not sure how they intend to do it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.text:
I will never permit that to happen.
Excise them, my bodyguards!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.text: Excise them all! Let none survive!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_STOMACH_100_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_STOMACH_100_C.text: You got me to deal with now, guy!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.text:
Your devious schemes end here,
foul parasite!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.text: I will never let you take the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: That should be the last of the parasites.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: Wait! Something's amiss at the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_010.text: A parasite? Then there were survivors!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.text: The Cognitheon is the brain of the Kosmos. If the parasite can establish itself there, it can usurp its will and become the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Perhaps that was the plan all along and
