the other parasites were but distractions.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.text:
And we completely fell for it.
A massive miscalculation!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.text:
The parasite has already begun to fuse!
It's sucking power out of the Cognitheon
in order to strengthen itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.text:
It doesn't seem to have fully fused
with the Cognitheon yet, which means
there may still be time!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.text:
Wait, look at the circuits over there...
They're still operating—though barely.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.text: Those are the circuits we repaired earlier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.text:
So what if we were to fix them again?
That might provide enough power for the
Cognitheon to fight off the infection.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.text: It's certainly worth a try. Er, do you know how to do that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.text:
I know we need to fix them
in the order they're flashing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.text:
We'll only have one chance at this.
Go, my friends! For the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.text:
Okay, let's repair the circuits
in the order they're flashing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.text: We have but one chance! Hurry!

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.text:
There's no time for a do-over.
Attack the parasite directly!

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
Your repairs stopped the parasite from
seizing control, and also gave the
Cognitheon the power to fight it off.

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
That gives us a chance to excise
the parasite for good!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.text:
With the flow of electricity severed,
it will attempt to take over again.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.text: We need to repair the circuits again!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.text:
We have to use this opening
to fix the circuits!

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's on the move again!
Get back to the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_BOFO_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's been repelled!
Now's our chance!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_000_000.text: This time, we finish it off!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.text:
Thank you both for your help.
We couldn't have done it without you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.text:
Our pleasure. Er, and while I hate to
sound like a broken record: triangle?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_040.text:
Yes! It's resonating with the frame!
Did you have this all along?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_050.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_050.text:
It was mixed in with my deliveries, but it
didn't have an address, so I didn't know
what to do with it. Take it if you want—
you'd actually be doing me a favor.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.text: And here is the way out.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_01.text:
And Erytheia's nowhere to be seen.
Now ain't that somethin'...

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_01.text:
Are you suggesting she was from Quisstatium?
That she was testing us this whole time?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.text:
All I know for certain is that the Kosmos
owes its continuing existence to you two—
which is why I will be joining your travels!

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_03.text:
Will the Kosmos be all right
in your absence?

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.text:
Any member of the Order of Leukos is capable
of replacing me—which is why I'm going with
you whether you wish it or not.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.text:
Better make room for Byaku, darlin'.
You know how stubborn he can be.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.text:
We'd be delighted to have you, Byaku. Plus,
I am just DYING to see the faces of everyone
in our precinct when you come sliding in.

SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_07.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_BOFO_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_07.text: Then let us be on our way.
